name: Good Weather
description: Good weather raises spirits among citizens.

criticalSuccess.msg: The glorious climate puts everyone in an excellent mood. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="lose" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1d6">Lose 1d6 Unrest</button>, and once during your next Kingdom turn when you attempt an Agriculture, Boating, Exploration, or Wilderness check, you can roll twice and take the better result.

modifiers.name: Good Weather: Critical Success
modifiers.buttonLabel: Roll twice when attempting a Agriculture, Boating, Exploration, or Wilderness check

success.msg: Extended good weather makes life pleasant and easy. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="lose" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1d4">Lose 1d4 Unrest</button>

failure.msg: Good weather produces a short but pleasant respite. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="lose" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Lose 1 Unrest</button>
